title: S17 Ep77: Supernatural News/Parashare: The Creepiest Episode Ever Edition
itunes:title: Supernatural News/Parashare: The Creepiest Episode Ever Edition
description:
Darkness Radio presents Supernatural News/Parashare: The Creepiest Episode Ever Edition with Beer City Bruiser!! 

It has been a week where it seems like everything is rising up to get us in the world of the paranormal and Tim and Bruiser have armored up, loaded up and got the bug out bags ready and have all the news stories for you!

This week,  As Alien activity is on the rise, a TV Physicist says he is a UFO Hunter for the Government! A Haunted Inn in England has turned it up to 11, and you won't believe the extremes they have gone to to give you a paranormal experience, Alexa now will talk in the voice of your dead loved one, and oh yeah... t-minus three months until Tesla has REAL ROBOTS in your home!!
PLUS: your Parashare stories!

Here is what an "Extraterrestrial Coin" looks like:  https://www.newsweek.com/man-discovers-extraterrestrial-coin-michigan-1717606

Watch "Draven"'s videos (as described on his Parashare) on his YouTube here:  https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLKuMyh1VWrf9zTmpQiNd2dmJEaMhHbWal

Find out where Beer City Bruiser is holding his breath and needlepointing near you: https://twitter.com/bcbwinchester
